Recipe.title: Pumpkin Pie
Recipe.Source: From the Kitchen of Bobbi Beagley
Recipe.Description: When Jennie and Ransom were first married, they each felt that their mother's pumpkin pie recipe was the best. So, we had a bake-off. In the end, it was decided that Ransom's mom's recipe looked the best, but that Jennie's mom's tasted the best. So, Jennie's mom's is the one we make each year.

section.instruction: Mix all ingredients with a beater until smooth.
Pour into pie pans with uncooked pie crust.
Reduce temperature to 350°rees; and bake for an additional 35 minutes.

Notes.note:
You cannot serve pumpkin pie without whipped cream, or vanilla ice cream.
(Or both &smiley;)
